Package com.composum.pages.options.microsite.strategy

Class MicrositeSourceTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.options.microsite.strategy.MicrositeSourceTransformer
  • public class MicrositeSourceTransformer
extends Object
    this transformer is rewriting relative URLs in the source files of an imported ZIP site

      • MicrositeSourceTransformer

        public MicrositeSourceTransformer​(String htmlRoot,
                                  String fileRoot)
        constructor with the URL (path) of the landing page as general base for all sources
        Parameters:
        htmlRoot - the base URL for all relative URLs to HTML targets in the source
        fileRoot - the base URL for all relative URLs to non HTML targets in the source

    • Method Detail

      • transformUrl

        public String transformUrl​(String relBase,
                           String url,
                           boolean isIndex,
                           String indexPath,
                           boolean htmlContext)
        build the URL relative to the microsite root relative to url base of the transformed source
        Parameters:
        relBase - the base path of the source relative to the source root
        url - the URL from the original source to transform
        isIndex - 'true' if transforming the 'index.html' file
        Returns:
        the transformed URL in relation to the root base

      • transformHtml

        public String transformHtml​(String relBase,
                            String source,
                            boolean isIndex,
                            String indexPath)
        transforms an HTML source file and rewrites all URLs to use the landing page as base URL
        Parameters:
        relBase - the base path of the transformed file relative to the root URL
        source - the source code to transform
        isIndex - 'true' if transforming the 'index.html' file
        Returns:
        the transformed source code

      • transform

        public String transform​(String relBase,
                        String source,
                        boolean isIndex,
                        String indexPath,
                        boolean htmlContext,
                        Pattern pattern)
        transforms the source string applying one pattern
        Parameters:
        relBase - the base path of the transformed file relative to the root URL
        source - the source code to transform
        isIndex - 'true' if transforming the 'index.html' file
        pattern - the pattern to apply
        Returns:
        the transformed source code
